TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl
Public MustInherit Class WebZone Inherits CompositeControl

summary.span: 作为 Web 部件应用程序中充当服务器控件的容器的所有控件（包括 Web 部件 控件、服务器控件和用户控件）的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all controls that act as containers for server controls (including Web Parts controls, server controls, and user controls) in Web Parts applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件区域是在网页上包含服务器控件的已定义区域，为所包含的控件提供 (UI) 、布局和呈现的一致的用户界面。A Web Parts zone is a defined region that contains server controls on a Web page, and provides a consistent user interface (UI), layout, and rendering for the contained controls. 区域在浏览器中呈现为 HTML 表。Zones are rendered in a browser as HTML tables. 类是所有 Web 部件区域的基类。The class is the base class for all Web Parts zones. 区域控件是设计用于包含其他控件的复合控件，因此 该类继承自 类。A zone control is a composite control designed to contain other controls, hence the class inherits from the class. 与 控件和 控件 (或可置于区域中的其他用户或服务器控件) ，派生自基类的区域控件 构成 Web 部件应用程序的基本构建基块。Together with the control and controls (or other user or server controls that can be placed in zones), zone controls derived from the base class form the essential building blocks of a Web Parts application. Web 部件区域的重要角色是为它们所包含的控件启用全部 Web 部件功能。A critical role of Web Parts zones is to enable full Web Parts functionality for the controls they contain. 每个 Web 部件页至少包含一个区域，并且一个区域可包含零个或多个部件控件。Every Web Parts page contains at least one zone, and a zone can contain zero or more part controls. Web 部件功能需要区域。Zones are required for Web Parts functionality. 如果没有区域，即使是从类派生的控件， Web 部件功能也非常少。Without zones, even controls that derive from the class can have very little Web Parts functionality. 相反，由于 Web 部件控件集的设计，你可以将普通的 ASP.NET 控件、服务器控件或用户控件置于 从) 派生的区域 ( 中，因此，在此区域中，可以在运行时将这些普通服务器控件用作 控件。Conversely, because of the design of the Web Parts control set, you can place ordinary ASP.NET controls, server controls, or user controls into a zone (which derives from ), and by virtue of being in the zone, these ordinary server controls are enable to act as controls at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅类的文档 。For details, see the documentation for the class. > [!NOTE] > 可以向 区域外部的页面添加或控制，但在这种情况下，它们只是普通的服务器控件。It is possible to add or controls to a page outside of a zone, but in that case they simply function as ordinary server controls. Web 部件控件集中有两个广泛的区域，它们都继承自基类 。There are two broad categories of zones in the Web Parts control set, all of which inherit from the base class. - 分区. zones. 其中包含 (和其他服务器和用户) 控件，并构成用户大多数时间交互的 Web 部件页面的主 UI。These contain (and other server and user) controls, and form the primary UI of Web Parts pages that users interact with most of the time. - 分区. zones. 这些区域提供 Web 部件页面的特殊视图，使用户能够修改 (个性化) Web 部件页面上区域中包含的控件的内容、布局、外观、行为和属性。These zones provide special views of a Web Parts page that enable users to modify (personalize) the content, layout, appearance, behavior, and properties of controls contained in zones on a Web Parts page. 例如， 区域是 提供页面目录视图的，使用户能够添加和删除服务器控件。For example, a zone is a that provides a catalog view of a page, enabling users to add and remove server controls. 区域是的另一种类型， 它提供页的编辑视图，使用户能够修改和编辑页面布局以及控件的属性、外观和行为。An zone is another type of that provides an editing view of a page, enabling users to modify and edit the layout of the page, along with the properties, appearance, and behavior of the controls. Web 部件控件集中的每个区域都设计为包含派生自类的相应类型的控件 ，部件控件充当区域的主要内容和主要用户界面。Each zone in the Web Parts control set is designed to contain a corresponding type of control derived from the class, with the part controls serving as the main content and primary UI of the zone. 下表显示了 Web 部件控件集内的区域类型以及它们所包含的部件控件的相应类型。Zone types in the Web Parts control set, along with the corresponding types of part controls they contain, are shown in the following table. |Part 控件类型Part control type|区域类型Zone type| |-----------------------|---------------| | (和服务器控件和用户控件，它们 在运行时用来包装) (and server and user controls, which are wrapped with a at run time)| (基类 ) (the base class is )| | (多个派生控件随 Web 部件控件集一起提供， 可以开发自定义控件) (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom controls can be developed)| (基类 ) (the base class is )| | (多个派生控件随 Web 部件控件集一起提供， 可以开发自定义控件) (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom controls can be developed)| (基类 ) (the base class is )| | (连接控件都是唯一的，因为它们不是继承自基类的部分控件) (connection controls are unique in that they are not part controls that inherit from the base class)| (直接从 ) 继承 (inherits directly from )| Web 部件控件中的所有区域都有基本的公共用户界面元素，它们继承自基类 。All zones in the Web Parts control have basic, common user interface elements that they inherit from the base class. 并非所有这些元素都在每个区域都可见，但每个区域类型都能够具有这些与区域相关的常见 UI 元素，如下表所述。Not all these elements are visible on every zone, but each zone type is capable of having these common, zone-related UI elements, as described in the following table. |区域部分Zone section|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |标头Header|区域的顶部部分。The top section of a zone. 它包括标题文本，该文本可以包括区域的标题;样式属性 (如) 区分标题的边框或背景色;和区域级别谓词 (用按钮、超链接或图像表示) 用户可以单击该按钮来执行应用于整个区域的 UI 操作，例如关闭区域。It includes header text, which can include a title for the zone; style attributes (such as a border or background color) that distinguish the header; and zone-level verbs (represented by buttons, hyperlinks, or images) that users can click to perform UI actions that apply to the entire zone, such as closing a zone. 一些 属性（例如 、 和 ）与区域的标题区相关。Several properties, such as , , and , relate to the header area of a zone. 如果区域中存在区域级别的谓词，则 和 属性应用于它们。If there are zone-level verbs in the zone, the and properties apply to them. 请注意，这两个谓词属性仅适用于区域级别的谓词，不适用于区域中包含的各个部件控件中的谓词。Note that these two verb properties apply to zone-level verbs only, not to verbs in the individual part controls contained in the zone. 标头不存在于每种类型的区域中;通常，它们显示在 需要具有带有文本和谓词（如 close 谓词）的公共标头区域的区域中。Headers are not present in every type of zone; typically they appear in zones where there is a need to have a common header area with text and a verb, such as a close verb.| |正文Body|区域的主要内容部分。The main contents section of a zone. 派生自的每个区域 都有一个正文部分。Every zone that derives from has a body section. 对于 Web 部件控件集中的所有类型的区域，区域的正文都包含指定类型的 控件 (或与区域类型对应的其他服务器控件) ，如上表所示。For all types of zones in the Web Parts control set, the body of the zone contains the designated type of controls (or other server controls) that correspond to a zone type, as indicated in the previous table. 类的各个成员将 影响正文部分的内容，例如 、 、 和 属性。Various members of the class affect the contents of the body section, such as the , , , and properties. 如果 body 部分为空，则 在某些情况下可以显示该消息。If the body section is empty, the message can be displayed in certain situations.| |ChromeChrome|为区域中的每个部件控件呈现的常见 UI 元素。The common UI elements rendered for each part control in a zone. 这不同于讨论适用于区域本身的样式特性;chrome 专门适用于包含的部件控件。This is distinct from a discussion of style attributes that apply to the zone itself; chrome applies specifically to the contained part controls. Chrome 包含区域的部件控件的谓词、边框和其他样式属性，如背景色或标题文本的字体样式。Chrome includes verbs, borders, and other style attributes such as background color, or font style of the title text, for a zone's part controls. 区域通过使用与它包含的部件控件类型相对应的单一 chrome 对象确定 chrome 详细信息 (例如， 包含 ) 控件的对象。A zone determines the chrome details by using a single chrome object appropriate to the type of part controls it contains (for example, a object for a that contains controls). 此单个 chrome 对象处理 chrome 详细信息，以及区域中所有部件控件的呈现。This single chrome object handles the chrome details and the rendering for all the part controls in the zone. 这使开发人员能够创建可在其中为所有部件控件指定一致的通用外观和风格的区域。This enables developers to create zones in which they can specify a consistent, common look and feel for all the part controls. 某些与区域的部件控件的 chrome 相关的属性包括 、 、 和 属性。Some properties that relate to the chrome for a zone's part controls include the , , , and properties. 请注意，大多数与 chrome 相关的属性（包括用于引用特定区域的 chrome 对象的特定属性）未在基类中实现 。Note that most chrome-related properties, including a specific property to reference the chrome object for a particular type of zone, are not implemented in the base class. 而是在特定的区域类型上实现区域的大多数 chrome 特定功能，这些功能适合其部件控件的独特需求。Instead, most chrome-specific features of zones are implemented on specific zone types as appropriate to the unique needs of their part controls. 请参阅本主题上表中列出的每个区域类型的主题。See the topics for each zone type listed in the previous table of this topic.| |部件控件Part Controls|驻留在区域的正文部分中的控件。The controls that reside in the body section of a zone. 继承自类的每个区域都 包含一个或多个对应类型的部件控件，如本主题前面的表中所示。Every zone that inherits from the class contains in its body section one or more part controls of a corresponding type, as shown in the previous table in this topic. 这些部分控制窗体是 Web 部件应用程序的主用户界面。These part controls form the main UI of Web Parts applications. 派生自的大多数区域类型 都有一个集合属性，该属性使其能够引用其包含的所有部件控件，如 类上的属性 ，以及 类的属性 。Most zone types that derive from have a collection property that enables them to reference all their contained part controls, such as the property on the class, and the property on the class.| |脚注Footer|区域的底部。The bottom section of a zone. 与标头部分一样，它不存在于每种类型的区域中，但通常出现在 区域中。Like the header section, it is not present in every type of zone, but usually occurs in zones. 脚注部分的典型内容是显示在区域页脚中的谓词，如 "确定" 或 "应用谓词" 。Typical contents of a footer section are verbs such as an ok verb or an apply verb, which appear in the footer of zones. 与脚注部分相关的某些属性包括 、 、 和 属性。Some properties that relate to the footer section include the , , , and properties.| 大多数 类的属性都在前面的表中进行了介绍，其中介绍了区域的常见 UI 元素。Most of the class's properties are discussed in the preceding table that describes the common UI elements of zones. 类还具有几个与其呈现内容的角色相关的方法。The class also has several methods relating to its role of rendering content. 、、 和方法都 可以重写，以提供对区域的每个特定部分的呈现的编程控制。The , , , and methods can all be overridden to provide programmatic control over the rendering of each specific section of a zone. 例如，如果要自定义应用程序中目录区域的所有脚注部分的呈现，则可以从 类继承，重写 从继承的方法 ，并更改脚注部分的呈现。For example, if you want to customize the rendering of all the footer sections of catalog zones in your application, you could inherit from the class, override the method inherited from , and change the rendering of the footer section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 此代码示例的第一部分演示从类派生的两个自定义控件 。The first part of the code example shows two custom controls that derive from the class. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_Zone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/CS/zonewebparts.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_Zone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/VB/zonewebparts.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示承载控件的网页 。The second part of the code example shows a Web page that hosts the controls. 请注意，声明性标记包含两个 控件：一个 控件和一个 控件。Notice that the declarative markup contains two controls, a control and an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/CS/zoneoverviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_Overview/VB/zoneoverviewvb.aspx#1)] 可以在浏览器中加载页面，并在各种页面显示模式间切换，以查看不同区域的行为方式。You can load the page in a browser and switch among the various page display modes to see how the different zones behave. 有关显示模式以及允许用户在其中进行切换的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

para.span: 很少需要直接从 类继承来开发自定义 Web 部件区域。

span.span: You rarely need to inherit directly from the class to develop custom Web Parts zones.

para.span: "Web 部件" 控制集包含上面的 "备注" 部分中列出的专用区域，通常可以从其中一个区域派生，以将自定义行为添加到区域。

span.span: The Web Parts control set contains the specialized zones listed above in the Remarks section, and usually you can derive from one of them to add custom behavior to a zone.

para.span: 如果决定直接从 类继承，则必须重写多个属性和方法 (查看) 类成员的文档 。

span.span: If you do decide to inherit directly from the class, you must override a number of properties and methods (see the documentation for the members of the class).

para.span: 还必须创建一个自定义 控件（可选）自定义 控件，以创建用于查看区域的唯一显示模式，以及用于使区域在 Web 部件控件集内工作的其他自定义项。

span.span: You must also create a custom control, optionally a custom control to create a unique display mode in which to view your zone, and other customizations to make your zone work within the Web Parts control set.
ASP.NET Web Parts Overview
Web Parts Control Set Overview

related.span: 演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string BackImageUrl { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property BackImageUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ BackImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BackImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指向区域的背景图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to a background image for a zone.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示指向用作区域的背景图像的图像的 URL。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image used as a background image for the zone.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 区域的背景图像显示在区域的内容可见的所有显示模式中。The background image for a zone is visible in all display modes in which a zone's contents are visible. 如果区域包含部件控件，则该图像将显示在控件的后面。If a zone contains part controls, the image appears behind the controls. 如果区域不包含任何控件，则其内容不会在浏览模式下呈现，因此不会显示图像。If a zone contains no controls, its contents are not rendered in browse mode, so the image is not displayed. 如果提供的图像小于区域的主体，则将平铺以覆盖整个正文区。If the supplied image is smaller than the body of a zone, it is tiled to cover the full body area. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，声明性标记中有两个区域，第二个 `` 元素为空。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl/CS/zonebackimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_BackImageUrl/VB/zonebackimageurlvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中，您可以切换到设计模式以查看空区域中的图像。In a browser, you can switch to design mode to see the image in the empty zone. 请注意， 此示例中未提供属性的实际 URL。Note that an actual URL for the property is not provided in this example. 有关如何更改页显示模式的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string EmptyZoneText { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property EmptyZoneText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ EmptyZoneText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EmptyZoneText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当区域不包含任何控件时显示的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a message that appears when a zone contains no controls.

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含在空区域中显示的消息。

span.span: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.

value.span: 默认的区域性特定字符串由 .NET Framework 提供。

span.span: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当区域中没有控件并且区域处于个性化模式之一（如编辑、设计或目录模式）时，将显示属性中的文本。The text in the property appears when there are no controls in a zone, and the zone is in one of the personalization modes, such as edit, design, or catalog mode. > [!NOTE] > 当区域进入可允许对区域内容进行个性化设置更改的个性化设置模式之一时，该 控件会将 属性值设置为 `true` 其属性中引用的显示模式对象上的属性值 。When a zone enters one of the personalization modes that would allow personalization changes to be made to the zone's contents, the control sets the property value to `true` on the display mode object referenced in its property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，声明性标记中有两个区域，第二个 `` 元素为空。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText/CS/zoneemptyzonetextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_EmptyZoneText/VB/zoneemptyzonetextvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中，您可以切换到设计模式来查看为 空区域中显示的属性提供的文本。In a browser, you can switch to design mode to see the text supplied for the property displayed in the empty zone. 有关如何更改页显示模式的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EmptyZoneTextStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ EmptyZoneTextStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取空区域中的占位符文本的样式特性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for the placeholder text in an empty zone.

value.span: ，其中包含分配给区域的 属性的文本的样式特性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the text assigned to a zone's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ErrorStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ ErrorStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于呈现在无法加载或创建 控件时显示的错误消息的样式特性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for rendering the error message that is displayed if a control cannot be loaded or created.

value.span: 包含该错误消息的样式特性的 。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，如果 .NET Framework 无法加载或创建控件的实例 ，将 创建类的实例并将其显示在其位置。At run time, if the .NET Framework is unable to load or create an instance of a control, an instance of the class is created and displayed in its place. 此对象包含一条错误消息，并且属性中的样式属性 将应用于错误消息。This object contains an error message, and the style attributes from the property are applied to the error message.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property HasFooter As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool HasFooter { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示区域中是否具有页脚区域。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a footer area.

value.span: 如果区域具有页脚区域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性主要由创建自定义区域的控件开发人员使用。The property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones. 它作为标志存在，以便 Web 部件控件集仅在适用于区域时呈现脚注。It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a footer only when appropriate for a zone. 例如， 属性重写此属性并返回 `false` ，因此不会为控件呈现脚注 。For example, the property overrides this property and returns `false`, so that a footer is not rendered for a control. 工具区域 (通过类从类间接派生的区域 ，如 和 ) 必须具有页脚，以便例如，它们可以使用 "确定"、"应用" 和 "取消" 按钮（如 **"确定**"、" **应用**" 和 " **取消** "）在区域底部呈现常见用户界面 (UI) 谓词。Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the class by means of the class, such as and ) must have footers so that, for example, they can render common user interface (UI) verbs with buttons such as **OK**, **Apply**, and **Cancel** at the bottom of the zone. 由于 属性默认为 `true` ，因此工具区域不需要重写属性。Because the property is `true` by default, tool zones do not need to override the property.

para.span: 如果创建的是从派生的自定义工具区域 ，则可以重写 方法，并为区域的脚注提供呈现功能。

span.span: If you are creating a custom tool zone that derives from , you can override the method and provide rendering for your zone's footer.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property HasHeader As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool HasHeader { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示区域是否具有页眉区域。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a header area.

value.span: 如果该区域具有页眉区域，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the zone has a header area; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性主要由创建自定义区域的控件开发人员使用。The property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones. 它作为标志存在，以便 Web 部件控件集仅在适用于区域时呈现标头。It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a header only when appropriate for a zone. 例如， 属性重写此属性，并返回， `false` 除非该页处于允许个性化的模式之一。For example, the property overrides this property and returns `false` unless the page is in one of the modes that allow personalization. 在这种情况下，不会在浏览模式中呈现控件的标头 ，而在大多数其他模式下，将呈现标头。In this case, a header is not rendered for a control in browse mode, while in most other modes a header is rendered. 有关显示模式以及允许用户在其中进行切换的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 工具区域 (通过类从类间接派生的区域 ，如 和 ) 必须具有仅当页面处于适当的显示模式时才显示的标头。Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the class by means of the class, such as and ) must have headers that appear only when the page is in the appropriate display mode. 由于 属性默认为 `true` ，因此它们不需要重写属性。Because the property is `true` by default, they do not need to override the property.

para.span: 如果创建的是从派生的自定义工具区域 ，则可以重写 方法，并为区域的标头提供呈现方式。

span.span: If you are creating a custom tool zone that derives from , you can override the method and provide rendering for your zone's header.

related.span: 演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string HeaderText { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property HeaderText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ HeaderText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HeaderText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置区域的页眉区的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text for the header area of a zone.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含区域的页眉文本。

span.span: A string that contains the header text for the zone.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当网页进入某些显示模式时，将显示区域属性的内容。The contents of a zone's property are displayed when a Web page enters certain display modes. 例如，在具有控件的页面上 ， 当页面进入编辑、目录或设计模式时，分配给该属性的文本将变为可见。For example, on a page that has a control, the text assigned to the property becomes visible when the page enters edit, catalog, or design mode. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，声明性标记中有两个区域，第二个 `` 元素为空。Note that there are two zones in the declarative markup, and the second `` element is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_HeaderText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_HeaderText/CS/zoneheadertextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_HeaderText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_HeaderText/VB/zoneheadertextvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中，可以将页面切换到设计模式，以查看为 区域的标题区域中显示的属性提供的文本。In a browser, you can switch the page to design mode to see the text supplied for the property displayed in the header area of the zone. 有关如何更改页显示模式的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details on how to change page display modes, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed

span.span: The previously saved state.

summary.span: 为某个区域加载以前保存的状态信息。

span.span: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 方法加载以前保存的区域的状态信息。The method loads previously saved state information for a zone. 它重写基 方法，以同时加载区域的各种样式属性的状态信息，例如 、 和 。It overrides the base method to also load state information for the various style properties of a zone, such as , , and .

exception.span: 对象的大小与当前视图状态对象的大小不相等。

span.span: The size of the object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以定义区域中包含的所有控件的每个控件的内容与每个控件的边框之间的标准填充量。Use this property to define a standard padding amount between the content of each control and its border for all controls contained in a zone.

exception.span: 赋给该属性的值为负数。

span.span: The value assigned to the property is a negative number.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PartChromeStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ PartChromeStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取适用于区域所包含的 Web 部件控件的边框的样式属性。

span.span: Gets style characteristics that apply to the borders of Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

value.span: ，其中包含区域所包含的 Web 部件控件的边框样式特性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the borders that surround Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件可以有其自己的边框，在属性中定义 。A Web Parts control can have its own border, defined in the property. 包含控件的区域可以在控件周围添加其他外边框。The zone that contains the control can add an additional outer border around the control. 区域可以围绕其每个 Web 部件控件设置的外边框由 属性确定。The outer border that a zone can place around each of its Web Parts controls is determined by the property. 此属性不取消对象中包含的属性属性 ; 它与合并或添加到它们中。This property does not cancel out the property attributes contained in the object; it is merged with or added to them. 它使区域能够为它包含的每个 Web 部件控件提供一个公共且一致的边框。It enables a zone to provide a common and consistent border for each of the Web Parts controls it contains. > [!IMPORTANT] > 尽管 样式设置主要应用于区域可以围绕其包含的控件设置的外边框，但如果在属性引用的对象上设置附加属性 （例如），则浏览器会将 这些样式特性解释为用于呈现区域的表的所有子元素。Although the style settings apply primarily to the outer border that a zone can set around the controls it contains, if you set additional properties on the object referenced by the property, such as , the browser interprets those style attributes as applying to all the sub-elements of the table used to render a zone. 因此， 为属性引用的样式对象设置属性与 在 属性所引用的对象上设置属性的控件效果相同 。Hence, setting the property for the style object referenced by the property has the same effect on a control as setting the property on the object referenced by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用属性为区域中包含的 Web 部件控件的外边框设置样式特性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to set style attributes for the outer borders of Web Parts controls contained in a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle/CS/zonepartchromestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartChromeStyle/VB/zonepartchromestylevb.aspx#1)] 请注意，在浏览器中首次加载页面时，上部控件具有其自己的绿色边框，宽度为2个像素，在页面的声明性标记中设置为。Note that when you first load the page in a browser, the upper control has its own green border with a width of 2 pixels, as set in the declarative markup for the page. 用户单击日历后，页面以编程方式将区域中的两个控件的边框更改为红色，并将其边框宽度设置为4像素，而上部控件则保留其原来的绿色内部边框。After a user clicks the calendar, the page programmatically changes the borders of both controls in the zone to red, and sets their border width to 4 pixels, yet the upper control retains its original green inner border.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property PartChromeType As PartChromeType

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType PartChromeType { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::PartChromeType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置构成区域所包含的 Web 部件控件的框架的边框类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

value.span: ，确定构成区域所包含的 Web 部件控件的框架的边框类型。

span.span: A that determines the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的作用类似于区域中 Web 部件控件的默认属性。The property acts like a default property for the Web Parts controls in a zone. 如果 Web 部件控件设置了其 属性，则该属性在运行时将重写该属性的效果 。If a Web Parts control has its property set, that property overrides the effect of the property at run time. 如果 未设置控件的属性，或将设置为，则 属性的值将 确定控件的边框类型。If the control's property is not set, or is set to , the value of the property determines what kind of border the control has.

span.span: The value is not one of the values.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PartStyle As TableStyle
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle ^ PartStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取适用于区域所包含的每个 Web 部件控件的边框和内容的样式属性。

span.span: Gets style characteristics that apply to the border and contents of each Web Parts control contained by a zone.

value.span: ，其中包含区域中 Web 部件控件的样式特性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for the Web Parts controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 样式特性适用于区域中每个 Web 部件控件的边框和内容。The style attributes apply to the border and contents of every Web Parts control in a zone. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置 它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 此属性使您能够为区域包含的所有控件的内容提供一致的样式。This property enables you to provide a consistent style for the contents of all the controls a zone contains. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 请注意，在声明性标记的区域中，有一个 `` 元素和一个 `` 元素，这两个控件都作为运行时的 Web 部件控件，因为它们位于某个区域中。Note that in the zone referenced in the declarative markup, there is an `` element and an `` element, with both controls acting as Web Parts controls at run time because they are in a zone. 用户在日历控件上单击某个日期后，该页面以编程方式使用 属性将区域中所有部件控件的背景色更改为红色。After the user clicks a date on the calendar control, the page programmatically uses the property to change the background color of all part controls in the zone to red. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_Zone_PartStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartStyle/CS/zonepartstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_Zone_PartStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_Zone_PartStyle/VB/zonepartstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 区域控件的主体是其页眉和页脚区域之间的部分。The body of a zone control is the portion between its header and footer areas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于确定谓词在区域的谓词菜单中的显示方式。The property can be used to determine how the verbs will appear in the verbs menu of a zone. 谓词可以作为按钮、超链接或可单击的图像出现。Verbs can appear as a button, a hyperlink, or a clickable image.
